group_1.narration: [textBlack:＜Rika and Ren had the power to make everyone]@[textBlack:in the town happy by harnessing the Christmas spirit,]@[textBlack:but there was no explanation how to use it.]@[textBlack:Mitama had suddenly disappeared,]@[textBlack:and now they were in trouble.＞]
[textBlack:＜The swallow that appeared]@[textBlack:before them claimed to be Mitama's]@[textBlack:beloved disciple...＞]

group_1.textLeft: I think “Chun” sounds cooler!

group_1.textRight: If you’re really Mitama’s disciple,@prove it to us.

group_1.textLeft: That powerful master-disciple love that overflows@from my heart… That’s proof enough.
Hmph, then I’ll explain it more@directly!
Master saved me when I fell out of my@nest, chun!
Although I was a lowly swallow,@I wanted to repay her.
I’ve become spellbound to help my@Master in any way I can.

group_1.textRight: Miss Mitama’s magic…became an@unbreakable bond between you two...
...I guess if Ren believes you,@then it’s fine for the time being.

group_1.textLeft: What is it, chun?

group_1.textRight: It’s nice and all to have magic that’ll@make everyone happy...
...But what are we actually supposed to do?

group_1.textLeft: Well that’s easy, chun!
Use your new magic to defeat the@Yowamushi Heart!
It’s a weak heart that lacks any courage.
If you defeat it with your magic,@everyone will have a bright Christmas!
It’s the goal of Master’s mission!@That’s why you need to do it.

group_1.textRight: Buuut, how do we use it?

group_1.textLeft: You’d understand how to if you’d@listened to Master's hint!

group_1.textRight: Um… Okay, miss Mitama said… “It can only@be used if you act as one person” and...
“You can't use this magic if you're not@in touch with each other's hearts”, um...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, that’s the hint!

group_1.textRight: When do you know...when you’re in touch@with someone’s heart...?

group_1.textLeft: Maybe it’s when you think the same thing?

group_1.textRight: Umm...empathy...compassion...@That’s what I associate it with…

group_1.textLeft: Hey!@Ren, I think you got it!
Yeah?
Whoa!@I think we were in perfect sync!
...I knew it!
If we both think alike,@then I think that makes us kindred spirits!

group_1.textRight: I don’t know...@Do you think it worked…?

group_1.textLeft: Nothing’s happening, chun.
Anyways,@let’s go around the town together.
We have to chase away ten Yowamushi@Hearts!

group_1.textRight: I’m trying to...@make the whole town happy...
Is just ten of them...@really enough…?

group_1.textLeft: Just getting rid of one will make@the whole town a little happier.
So, I think ten will be okay.

group_1.textRight: That’s good to hear. When you were first telling@us about this, you made it sound even harder.
...So how do we find a Yowamushi Heart?

group_1.textLeft: Well, I’ve already found one, chun.
I have the power to detect any sign@of the Hearts, so just follow me!
Oh, nice!@Let’s go, Ren!
